job.title: Expert Asp.net dev wanted
job.description:
Job Summary:
We are seeking a skilled .NET Developer with expertise in implementing SignalR to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in .NET development, particularly in building real-time web applications using SignalR technology. As a .NET Developer focused on SignalR, you will play a crucial role in designing, developing, and maintaining scalable and responsive web applications that require real-time communication features.

Responsibilities:

SignalR Implementation:
Design and implement real-time communication features using SignalR technology.
Develop robust and scalable server-side components to support real-time client-server communication.
Configure and optimize SignalR hubs, connections, and message handling for optimal performance.
.NET Development:
Develop, test, and deploy .NET applications, APIs, and services using C# and ASP.NET.
Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code following best practices and design patterns.
Collaborate with front-end developers to integrate SignalR functionality into web applications.
Database Integration:
Integrate SignalR with databases and data storage solutions to facilitate real-time data updates and synchronization.
Implement data access logic and data manipulation operations using Entity Framework or other ORM frameworks.
Testing and Debugging:
Conduct unit tests and integration tests to ensure the reliability and performance of SignalR features.
Debug and troubleshoot issues related to real-time communication, network connectivity, and data synchronization.
Documentation and Technical Support:
Document design decisions, implementation details, and usage guidelines for SignalR components.
Provide technical support and guidance to other team members on SignalR implementation best practices.
Requirements:

Proven experience as a .NET Developer with a focus on implementing SignalR in web applications.
Strong proficiency in C#, ASP.NET, and the .NET Framework.
Experience with real-time web technologies such as WebSockets, SSE, or SignalR.
Solid understanding of client-server architecture, RESTful APIs, and web protocols (HTTP, WebSocket).
Familiarity with front-end technologies such as JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and modern JavaScript frameworks (e.g., Angular, React) is a plus.
Knowledge of database technologies and SQL (e.g., SQL Server, MySQL, PostgreSQL).
Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field preferred.

customFields.generatedDescriptionAI:
We are looking for an expert ASP.NET developer to join our team on a short-term project, lasting less than 1 month. The ideal candidate should have a strong command of HTML, API, .NET Framework, ASP.NET, CSS, JavaScript, and ASP.NET MVC.

As an ASP.NET developer, your main responsibility will be to develop and maintain web applications using the ASP.NET framework. You will work closely with our team to gather requirements, design and implement solutions, and ensure the overall functionality and performance of the applications.

To apply for this position, please submit a proposal detailing how you can contribute to the project. Please include relevant links to past completed projects that showcase your expertise in ASP.NET development.

We look forward to reviewing your proposals and discussing the project further. Thank you!
